articles.author: Michael Arinze
articles.title: Bucks vs Pacers Odds, Prediction: NBA Playoffs Game 2 Picks - Action Network
articles.description: Read for our Milwaukee Bucks vs Indiana Pacers Game 2 odds, predictions, and picks in the NBA Playoffs on Tuesday, April 22.
articles.content: The Milwaukee Bucks (0-1) and Indiana Pacers (1-0) will meet in Game 2 of their first round NBA Playoff series tonight. Tipoff is set for 7 p.m. ET at the Gainbridge Fieldhouse in Indianapolis, India… [+3892 chars]
